name: Puzzle Crowns
blurb: Puzzle Crowns, a puzzle game with an Epic flare for iPad

rewards.reward: Puzzle Crowns salute.\r\nThanks for your support to the project.\r\nYour name will be listed in the credits.

Puzzle Crowns with love.
Thanks for your support to the project.
3 wallpapers for mobile devices and computers.
Your name will be listed in the credits.

Puzzle Crowns' adventure.
Thanks for your support to the project.
You will be offered a free copy of the game when the app is released on iPad.
3 wallpapers for mobile devices and computers.
Your name will be listed in the credits.

Puzzle Crowns' Ranger.
Thanks for your support to the project.
You will be offered a free copy of the game when the app is released on iPad.
3 wallpapers for mobile devices and computers.
Main title audio track in MP3 or Flac.
Your name will be listed in the credits.

Puzzle Crowns' Spell. 
Thanks for your support to the project.
Limited edition of a PDF booklet with artworks from the game + 1 limited edition postcard of Puzzle Crowns.
The game's soundtracks in MP3 or Flac format.
You will be offered a free copy of the game when the app is released on iPad.
3 wallpapers for mobile devices and computers.
Your name will be listed in the credits.

Puzzle Crowns' legacy.
Thanks for your support to the project.
You will receive a 5x7 soft cover artbook + 1 limited edition postcard signed + Limited edition of a PDF booklet with artworks from the game.
The game's soundtracks in MP3 or Flac format.
You will be offered a free copy of the game when the app is released on iPad + Free copies of the game on any other platform the game should be released on. 
3 wallpapers for mobile devices and computers.
Your name will be listed in the credits.

Puzzle Crowns' Rogues.
Thanks for your support to the project.
You will get a limited edition of Puzzle Crowns Map on a poster + You will receive a 5x7 soft cover artbook + Limited edition of a PDF booklet
with artworks from the game + 1 limited edition postcard of Puzzle Crowns signed by me.
The game's soundtracks in MP3 or Flac format.
You will be offered a free copy of the game when the app is released on iPad + Free copies of the game on any other platform the game should be released on.
3 wallpapers for mobile devices and computers.
Your name will be listed in the special thanks credits.

Puzzle Crowns' Heroes.\r\nThanks for your support to the project. A puzzle will be called with your name.\r\nYou will get a 11x14 hardcover limited edition of Puzzle Crowns artbook + Puzzle Crowns'map on a poster, Limited edition of a PDF booklet with artworks from the game + 1 limited edition postcard of Puzzle Crowns signed by me. The game's soundtracks in MP3 or Flac format. You will be offered a free copy of the game when the app is released on iPad + Free copies of the game on any other platform the game should be released on. 3 wallpapers for mobile devices and computers. Your name will be listed in the special thanks section in the credits.

Puzzle Crowns' Legends.\r\nYou will be painted in bonus puzzle backgrounds as an ancient Lord from Puzzle Crowns' world. We need a picture of you for the painting. Your name will be also given to a puzzle. You will get a 11x14 hardcover limited edition of Puzzle Crowns artbook + Puzzle Crowns'map on a poster, Limited edition of a PDF booklet with artworks from the game + 1 limited edition postcard of Puzzle Crowns signed by me. The game soundtrack in MP3 or Flac format. You will be offered a free copy of the game when the app is released on iPad + Free copies of the game on any other platform the game should be released on. 3 wallpapers for mobile devices and computers. Your name will be listed in the special thanks section in the credits.
